root.name: Grandia Xtreme
root.description: OverviewÂ Grandia Xtreme is a turn-based role-playing game developed by Game Arts and published by Enix Corporation. It was originally released in Japan on January 31, 2002, and later released in the United States on September 30, 2002. The game is somewhat of a departure for the series. Whereas the previous Grandia games focused on story telling, Grandia Xtreme places more emphasis on dungeon-crawling.
